document.full_text: huawei technologies co ltd , the world's no.2 network equipment maker, expects revenue to reach the $100 billion mark in a decade, driven by sales of telecom devices and smartphones, despite a slowdown in revenue growth this year.
document.title: china's huawei sees $100 billion revenue in 10 years
lines_and_colors: huawei technologies co ltd , the world's no.2 network equipment maker, expects revenue to reach the $100 billion mark in a decade, driven by sales of telecom devices and smartphones, despite a slowdown in revenue growth this year.
